hero.title: VeloFlux
hero.subtitle: Next-Generation AI-Powered Load Balancer
hero.description: Experience intelligent traffic routing with advanced machine learning algorithms. VeloFlux automatically optimizes performance, predicts traffic patterns, and scales resources in real-time.

networkVisualization.title: Network Visualization
networkVisualization.description: Real-time interactive view of your network topology

features.title: Features
features.description: Discover the powerful capabilities that make VeloFlux the next-generation load balancer

ai.title: AI-Powered Features
ai.description: Leverage advanced machine learning algorithms for intelligent traffic management and predictive optimization

aiPoweredRouting.title: AI-Powered Routing
aiPoweredRouting.description: Neural networks analyze real-time traffic patterns to make intelligent routing decisions and optimize backend selection

predictiveAnalytics.title: Predictive Analytics
predictiveAnalytics.description: Machine learning models predict traffic spikes and automatically pre-scale infrastructure before demand increases

anomalyDetection.title: Anomaly Detection
anomalyDetection.description: Advanced algorithms detect unusual patterns and automatically implement failover strategies to maintain service quality

performanceOptimization.title: Performance Optimization
performanceOptimization.description: AI-generated configuration recommendations and automatic tuning for optimal load balancing performance

core.title: Enterprise Features
core.description: Built from the ground up for modern cloud infrastructure with production-tested reliability

sslTermination.title: SSL/TLS Termination
sslTermination.description: Automatic ACME certificates with Let's Encrypt, HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 support, SNI routing

healthMonitoring.title: Health Monitoring
healthMonitoring.description: Active HTTP/TCP health checks, passive failure detection, exponential backoff retry

geoAwareRouting.title: Geo-Aware Routing
geoAwareRouting.description: Route traffic to the nearest healthy backend using MaxMind GeoIP, anycast support

loadBalancing.title: Load Balancing
loadBalancing.description: Round-robin, least-connections, IP-hash, weighted backends with sticky sessions

protocolSupport.title: Protocol Support
protocolSupport.description: WebSocket pass-through, gRPC proxy, HTTP/1.1, HTTP/2, HTTP/3 (QUIC)

securityFeatures.title: Security Features
securityFeatures.description: Rate limiting, DDoS protection, IP whitelisting/blacklisting, WAF integration

highPerformance.title: High Performance
highPerformance.description: Rust-powered core with async I/O, zero-copy networking, sub-millisecond latency

cloudNative.title: Cloud Native
cloudNative.description: Kubernetes integration, Docker support, Helm charts, service mesh compatibility

aiShowcase.title: Witness the {{highlight}} in Action
aiShowcase.description: Experience how our advanced AI algorithms transform traditional load balancing into an intelligent, self-optimizing system

intelligentRouting.title: Intelligent Routing
intelligentRouting.description: Neural networks analyze real-time metrics to route traffic optimally

predictiveScaling.title: Predictive Scaling
predictiveScaling.description: ML models forecast demand and pre-scale infrastructure automatically

anomalyDetection.title: Anomaly Detection
anomalyDetection.description: Advanced algorithms detect and mitigate issues before they impact users

autoOptimization.title: Auto-Optimization
autoOptimization.description: Continuous learning improves performance without manual intervention

demo.description: Experience real-time AI decision making and performance optimization

liveDemo.title: Live AI/ML Demonstrations
liveDemo.subtitle: Real-time metrics and intelligent decision making
liveDemo.description: Watch our AI algorithms optimize traffic routing, predict load patterns, and automatically scale resources in real-time.

hero.description: VeloFlux is more than just a load balancer - it's an intelligent traffic orchestration platform that adapts and learns from your infrastructure to deliver optimal performance.

performance.title: Performance

security.title: Security
security.description: Enterprise-grade security with built-in WAF and DDoS protection

intelligence.title: Intelligence
intelligence.description: AI-powered traffic optimization and predictive scaling

globalScale.title: Global Scale
globalScale.description: Worldwide distribution with edge computing capabilities

author.subtitle: The mind behind VeloFlux
author.name: Elton Ciatto
author.description: Full-stack developer and infrastructure architect passionate about building high-performance systems that scale globally

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Traditional load balancers lack intelligence and adaptability in modern cloud environments.

vision.title: The Vision
vision.description: Create an AI-powered load balancer that learns and adapts to optimize traffic automatically.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: VeloFlux LB - intelligent, secure, and scalable load balancing for the modern web.

cta.title: Ready to Experience VeloFlux?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers who trust VeloFlux for their load balancing needs.

content.intro: Your privacy is important to us.
content.commitment: We are committed to protecting your data.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.message: We received your message and will respond soon.

response.question: What's the response time?
response.answer: We respond to emails within 24 business hours.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: We offer support via email, chat, and phone depending on your plan.

emergency.question: What about emergencies?
emergency.answer: Enterprise customers have access to 24/7 phone support.

documentation.question: Where can I find documentation?
documentation.answer: Our complete documentation is available at docs.veloflux.io.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

free.name: Community
free.description: Perfect for small projects and development

pro.name: Professional
pro.description: For growing teams and production workloads

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large-scale operations with custom needs

trial.question: How does the free trial work?
trial.answer: Start with our Community plan for free, then upgrade to Pro for a 14-day free trial. No credit card required for Community.

billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: We bill monthly or annually based on your usage. Annual plans have 20% discount. No hidden fees or surprises.

scaling.question: What happens if I exceed my limits?
scaling.answer: We'll notify you before you reach your limits. You can upgrade your plan or we'll work with you on custom pricing for your needs.

support.question: What support is included?
support.answer: Community plan includes community support, Pro includes email support, and Enterprise includes 24/7 dedicated support with SLA.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime. Your service will continue until the end of your billing period.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Read our terms and conditions

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using VeloFlux, you agree to these terms of service.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: VeloFlux is an AI-powered load balancing platform.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for keeping your account secure.

payment.title: 4. Payment and Billing
payment.content: Payments are processed monthly or annually.

usage.title: 5. Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use our services responsibly.

privacy.title: 6. Privacy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy as outlined in our policy.

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: VeloFlux and its trademarks are our property.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Our liability is limited as per the law.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may change these terms with prior notice.

governing.title: 11. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by applicable law.

terms.acknowledgment: By using VeloFlux, you acknowledge having read and accepted these terms.
